ai_feedback.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - North Lincolnshire - Feedback

feedback.question: Did the text answer your query?
feedback.answer: No, I couldn't find any information on how to request permission for flat improvements like installing a new kitchen or adding a handrail.

points.question: Did the text answer your query?
points.answer: No, I couldn't find any information on how to request permission for flat improvements like installing a new kitchen or adding a handrail.

points.question: Was there anything that could have been clearer?
points.answer: Yes, the page is broken with an error message; I expected to see clear steps or a link to the form, but instead I got a 'Page not found' message.

points.question: Is there any way this text could be improved to make it easier for you to understand?
points.answer: The website should have a working page or clear guidance on how to apply for flat modifications, including forms, timelines, and what is permitted.
